title: Dataset - Token / CNFT Analytics
description: Currently NFT data is disparate and lacking metadata standards, making it hard to query and gain insights from.
solution: Open-source code repository for generating an analytics dataset from a mixture of on chain db-sync data as well as external data sources
experience: Founders of Cardano Canucks and Canuckz NFT with 30+ yrs experience in data infrastructure, analysis and visualization for enterprises.
